Key Match Events: Turkey's Baris Yilmaz was sent off after the interval for a second bookable offence
Wales were forced to make do with what will still be considered a well-earned point
Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy's meticulous approach to the finer points of the game had been a key driver in some of the early expectations around his reign
Post-Match Reflections: Bellamy's attention to detail is perhaps only matched by the burning passion he clearly already has for this job
Others: This was the first glimpse of a new era for Wales, who will look to build on what was a performance brimming with positives when they head to Montenegro on Monday
